member.summary: Defines the collectionFormat of a parameter.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterCollectionFormat.Undefined
member.summary: An undefined format.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterCollectionFormat.Csv
member.summary: Comma separated values "foo, bar".

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterCollectionFormat.Ssv
member.summary: Space separated values "foo bar".

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterCollectionFormat.Tsv
member.summary: Tab separated values "foo\tbar".

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterCollectionFormat.Pipes
member.summary: Pipe separated values "foo|bar".

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterCollectionFormat.Multi
member.summary: Corresponds to multiple parameter instances instead of multiple values for a single instance "foo=bar&foo=baz".

member.name: T:NSwag.SwaggerParameterKind
member.summary: Enumeration of the parameter kinds.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterKind.Undefined
member.summary: An undefined kind.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterKind.Body
member.summary: A JSON object as POST or PUT body (only one parameter of this type is allowed).

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterKind.Query
member.summary: A query key-value pair.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterKind.Path
member.summary: An URL path placeholder.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterKind.Header
member.summary: A HTTP header parameter.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterKind.FormData
member.summary: A form data parameter.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterKind.ModelBinding
member.summary: A model binding parameter (either form data, path or query; by default query; generated by Swashbuckle).

member.name: T:NSwag.SwaggerParameterStyle
member.summary: Enumeration of the parameter kinds.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterStyle.Undefined
member.summary: An undefined kind.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterStyle.Simple
member.summary: Comma-separated values. For Path parameters. Corresponds to the {param_name} URI template

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterStyle.Label
member.summary: Dot-prefixed values, also known as label expansion. For Path parameters. Corresponds to the {.param_name} URI template

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterStyle.Matrix
member.summary: Semicolon-prefixed values, also known as path-style expansion. For path parameters. Corresponds to the {;param_name} URI template

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterStyle.Form
member.summary: Ampersand-separated values. Also known as form-style query expansion. Corresponds to the {?param_name} URI template.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterStyle.SpaceDelimeted
member.summary: Space-separated array values. Same as collectionFormat: ssv in OpenAPI 2.0. Has effect only for non-exploded arrays (explode: false), that is, the space separates the array values if the array is a single parameter, as in arr=a b c.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterStyle.PipeDelimited
member.summary: Pipeline-separated array values. Same as collectionFormat: pipes in OpenAPI 2.0. Has effect only for non-exploded arrays (explode: false), that is, the pipe separates the array values if the array is a single parameter, as in arr=a|b|c.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerParameterStyle.DeepObject
member.summary: Simple way of rendering nested objects using form parameters (applies to objects only)

member.name: T:NSwag.SwaggerPathItem
member.summary: A Swagger path.

member.name: M:NSwag.SwaggerPathItem.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerPathItem.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent .

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerPathItem.Summary
member.summary: Gets or sets the summary (OpenApi only).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerPathItem.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description (OpenApi only).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerPathItem.Servers
member.summary: Gets or sets the servers (OpenAPI only).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerPathItem.Parameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameters.

member.name: T:NSwag.SwaggerResponse
member.summary: The Swagger response.

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerResponse.ExtensionData
member.summary: Gets or sets the extension data (i.e. additional properties which are not directly defined by the JSON object).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerResponse.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent .

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerResponse.ActualResponse
member.summary: Gets the actual response, either this or the referenced response.

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerResponse.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the response's description.

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerResponse.Headers
member.summary: Gets or sets the headers.

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerResponse.IsNullableRaw
member.summary: Sets a value indicating whether the response can be null (use IsNullable() to get a parameter's nullability).
member.remarks: The Swagger spec does not support null in schemas, see https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/issues/229

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerResponse.ActualResponseSchema
member.summary: Gets the actual non-nullable response schema (either oneOf schema or the actual schema).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerResponse.ExpectedSchemas
member.summary: Gets or sets the expected child schemas of the base schema (can be used for generating enhanced typings/documentation).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerResponse.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the descriptions of potential response payloads (OpenApi only).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerResponse.Links
member.summary: Gets or sets the links that can be followed from the response (OpenApi only).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerResponse.Schema
member.summary: Gets or sets the response schema (Swagger only).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerResponse.Examples
member.summary: Gets or sets the headers (Swagger only).

member.name: M:NSwag.SwaggerResponse.IsNullable(NJsonSchema.SchemaType)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified null handling is nullable (fallback value: false).

member.name: M:NSwag.SwaggerResponse.IsNullable(NJsonSchema.SchemaType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified null handling is nullable.
member.param: The fallback value when 'x-nullable' is not defined.

member.name: T:NSwag.SwaggerSchema
member.summary: The enumeration of Swagger protocol schemes.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerSchema.Undefined
member.summary: An undefined schema.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerSchema.Http
member.summary: The HTTP schema.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerSchema.Https
member.summary: The HTTPS schema.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerSchema.Ws
member.summary: The WS schema.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerSchema.Wss
member.summary: The WSS schema.

member.name: T:NSwag.SwaggerSchemaResolver
member.summary: Appends a JSON Schema to the Definitions of a Swagger document.

member.name: M:NSwag.SwaggerSchemaResolver.#ctor(NSwag.SwaggerDocument,NJsonSchema.Generation.JsonSchemaGeneratorSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:NSwag.SwaggerSchemaResolver.AppendSchema(NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4,System.String)
member.summary: Appends the schema to the root object.

member.name: T:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityApiKeyLocation
member.summary: Specifies the location of the API Key.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityApiKeyLocation.Undefined
member.summary: The API key kind is not defined.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityApiKeyLocation.Query
member.summary: In a query parameter.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityApiKeyLocation.Header
member.summary: In the HTTP header.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityApiKeyLocation.Cookie
member.summary: In the HTTP cookie (OpenAPI only).

member.name: T:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityRequirement
member.summary: The operation security requirements.

member.name: T:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityScheme
member.summary: The definition of a security scheme that can be used by the operations.

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityScheme.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the security scheme.
member.remarks: Changes the type to and the to "basic" set to .

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityScheme.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the short description for security scheme.

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityScheme.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the header or query parameter to be used to transmit the API key.

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityScheme.In
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the API key.

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityScheme.Scheme
member.summary: Gets or sets name of the HTTP Authorization scheme to be used in the Authorization header as defined in RFC7235 (OpenAPI only).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityScheme.BearerFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a hint to the client to identify how the bearer token is formatted. Bearer tokens are usually generated by an authorization server, so this information is primarily for documentation purposes (OpenAPI only).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityScheme.OpenIdConnectUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the OpenId Connect URL to discover OAuth2 configuration values (OpenAPI only).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityScheme.Flows
member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration information for the supported flow types (OpenAPI only).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityScheme.Flow
member.summary: Gets or sets the used by the OAuth2 security scheme (Swagger only).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityScheme.AuthorizationUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the authorization URL to be used for this flow (Swagger only).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityScheme.TokenUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the token URL to be used for this flow (Swagger only).

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerSecurityScheme.Scopes
member.summary: Gets the available scopes for the OAuth2 security scheme (Swagger only).

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerSecuritySchemeType.Undefined
member.summary: The security scheme is not defined.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerSecuritySchemeType.Basic
member.summary: Basic authentication.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerSecuritySchemeType.ApiKey
member.summary: API key authentication.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerSecuritySchemeType.OAuth2
member.summary: OAuth2 authentication.

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerSecuritySchemeType.Http
member.summary: HTTP authentication (OpenAPI only).

member.name: F:NSwag.SwaggerSecuritySchemeType.OpenIdConnect
member.summary: OpenIdConnect authentication (OpenAPI only).

member.name: T:NSwag.SwaggerTag
member.summary: Describes a Swagger tag.

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerTag.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name.

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerTag.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description.

member.name: P:NSwag.SwaggerTag.ExternalDocumentation
member.summary: Gets or sets the external documentation.
